entry.title: zeeshan2423/github-activity: GitHub User Activity CLI fetches and displays a user's recent GitHub activity using the GitHub API. View commits, issues, stars, and pull requests by entering a username. Built with Node.js, using no external libraries for a lightweight solution. Handles errors gracefully while ensuring efficient API interaction.
entry.content: GitHub User Activity CLI fetches and displays a user's recent GitHub activity using the GitHub API. View commits, issues, stars, and pull requests by entering a username. Built with Node.js, using no external libraries for a lightweight solution. Handles errors gracefully while ensuring efficient API interaction.
